org.springframework.web.servlet.view.tiles3

类 SimpleSpringPreparerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.view.tiles3.AbstractSpringPreparerFactory
      • org.springframework.web.servlet.view.tiles3.SimpleSpringPreparerFactory

  • public class SimpleSpringPreparerFactory
extends AbstractSpringPreparerFactory
    Tiles org.apache.tiles.preparer.PreparerFactory implementation that expects preparer class names and builds preparer instances for those, creating them through the Spring ApplicationContext in order to apply Spring container callbacks and configured Spring BeanPostProcessors.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.2
    另请参阅:
    SpringBeanPreparerFactory

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected ViewPreparer getPreparer(String name, WebApplicationContext context)
      Obtain a preparer instance for the given preparer name, based on the given Spring WebApplicationContext.

      • getPreparer

        protected ViewPreparer getPreparer(String name,
                                   WebApplicationContext context)
                            throws TilesException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractSpringPreparerFactory
        Obtain a preparer instance for the given preparer name, based on the given Spring WebApplicationContext.
        指定者:
        getPreparer 在类中 AbstractSpringPreparerFactory
        参数:
        name - the name of the preparer
        context - the current Spring WebApplicationContext
        返回:
        the preparer instance
        抛出:
        TilesException - in case of failure
